\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{normalize()}{normalize()}}
{\footnotesize\ttfamily void Correlator\+::normalize (\begin{DoxyParamCaption}{ }\end{DoxyParamCaption})}

Calculates the normalized correlation amplitudes and x-\/axis

Makes a copy of the current correlation curve, i.\+e., the x-\/axis and and the corresponding correlation amplitudes and calculates the values of the normalized correlation. \mbox{\Hypertarget{class_correlator_a57e67409c1784f6582d80ae72b642e5b}\label{class_correlator_a57e67409c1784f6582d80ae72b642e5b}}

tau\+\_\+j = tau\+\_\+(i\+\_\+casc -\/1 ) + 2 $\ast$$\ast$ (floor(i\+\_\+casc-\/1 / n\+\_\+bins))

for n\+\_\+casc = 3, n\+\_\+bins = 10 tau\+\_\+j = \href{j=0...n_casc*n_bins}{\texttt{ 0, 1, 2, ..., 9, 10, 12, ..., 28, 30, 34, ..., 70}}
